title: Not For Me: A Fake Dating Romance (A Drunk Love Contemporary Romance)
features: To avoid going on blind dates arranged by my mother, I agree to fake date my sister’s best friend. What could possibly go wrong?
Imagine my surprise when my sister’s best friend turns out to be the beautiful, dirty-talking woman who caught my attention while running in Central Park.
She’s fun, flirty, and everything I’m missing in my life.
And everything I can never have.
I had my chance at love. It isn’t in the cards for me, and I thought I was fine with that. But now I’m not so sure I can let her go when our fake relationship ends.
After three weeks with her, she challenges everything I’d come to accept. I want more than she’s willing to give
, but I can’t risk getting hurt a second time.
To protect my heart, I’ll have to work overtime to keep this relationship fake.
Not For Me is a dual POV steamy full-length STANDALONE romance filled with lots of sexy times in the bedroom, profanity, and love with a HEA ending!

Fans of Claire Kingsley, Melanie Harlow, Lauren Landish, and Amy Daws will love this new series by Aria Bliss. Get ready to stay up all night laughing, crying, and swooning because this series has it all. A fake dating, sister’s best friend, opposites attract, forced proximity romance with a sexy, grumpy bar manager who’s given up on love and a career-driven woman who only has eyes for her laptop. This one has all the feels and enough steam to fog up your windows.

The books in A Drunk Love Romantic Comedy series are all standalone novels and can be read in any order. But if you love family drama and the subtle build of future romances, I suggest you read them in order, starting with Not For Me.
description: ★★★★★ "I've read several books written by Aria Bliss; she is becoming one of my favorite authors. It had all the feels, good friends, family, a little bit of angst and a whole lot of steam and swoon-worthy sweetness and romance! ... Perfect story to remind you love is messy but worth taking a risk and fighting for to get your HEA!" (Krissy, goodreads review)★★★★★ "I loved this book! Sometimes a book is just so relatable you can't help but to just read until the book is done, this was one of those books." (Manda, goodreads review)★★★★★ "I loved this story so much. I was so invested in this story that I could not put it down." (Sharon, goodreads review)★★★★★ "The characters are exciting and realistic." (Laura, goodreads review)★★★★★ "This book had me feelings all the feels. Great job Aria." (Kathy, goodreads review)★★★★★ "This is a well written story which is humorous, entertaining, and with witty and flirty banter, family, friendships, intrigue, romance, undeniable chemistry, and love, which leads to a steamy and heartfelt addictive page turner." (Wendy, goodreads review)★★★★★ "Such a well written story with outstanding characters and I look forward to reading the next book released." (Read Review Repeat Blog)★★★★★ "This book is so good, a page turner, it has everything, a fun family, humor, steam, drama and great characters." (Karen, goodreads review)★★★★★ "This was the first in the series and the first for me from this author, but it definitely won't be my last. It has everything - wonderful main characters with depth and heart, witty dialog, hysterical situations and background stories and supportive friends and families." (Lisa, goodreads review)★★★★★ "One of the best books I've read lately! Laugh out loud funny and seriously steamy at times." (Sadie, goodreads review)★★★★★ "This is a great story that will draw you in from beginning to end. This is a well written and very entertaining story. I would recommend this book to any book lover." (Raecharmed, goodreads review)★★★★★ "A really great read. I enjoy both fake relationship and sibling best friend romances, and this book bring both genres together in a fabulously original story. From the first hilarious meeting to the HEA I enjoyed this book." (Sara, goodreads review)★★★★★ "I loved this read! Well written, great story line with good flow and amazing characters." (J, goodreads review)★★★★★ "Aria Bliss has given us another great romance book with wonderful characters. I really enjoyed this book and did not want to put it down till I finished it." (Karen, goodreads review)★★★★★ "Funny, sexy, second chance romance that is a definite must read." (Jacqueline, goodreads review)★★★★★ "I absolutely love this book! Amazing true to life characters and a wonderful storyline that grabs you and doesn't let go!" (Cricket, goodreads review)★★★★★ "I have apparently been sleeping on this author because I had not ran across any of her books and I had been missing out ...
